sentences.english: Festivities were undeterred by the heavy downpour.
sentences.chinese: 歡慶活動在傾盆大雨下如期舉行。

sentences.english: But at least for now the Tripolitans are not cheering all that much.
sentences.chinese: 但到現在爲止的黎波里市民還沒有肆意歡慶。

sentences.english: This is a time to celebrate.
sentences.chinese: 今晚是一個歡慶的盛會。

sentences.english: Chiang dynasty China on behalf of, the whole country to celebrate people to stand.
sentences.chinese: 蔣氏王朝中華替，舉國歡慶人民站。

sentences.english: In the villages we passed, the train was cause for celebration.
sentences.chinese: 在我們經過的村莊裏，火車引起人們歡慶。

sentences.english: “Congratulations, ” they tell the family of the crew.
sentences.chinese: 他們告訴家人“一起歡慶啊。”

sentences.english: From north to south, celebrations erupted across the land.
sentences.chinese: 全國上下從南到北都在歡慶這一勝利。

sentences.english: Dollywood shows and celebrates America's traditional southeastern culture.
sentences.chinese: 多萊塢展示並歡慶美國東南地區的傳統文化。

sentences.english: People always enjoy the lighted lanterns and the gala performances.
sentences.chinese: 人們都很喜歡這些點亮的燈籠和歡慶的表演。

sentences.english: Should we celebrate the joy and magic that movies bring?
sentences.chinese: 我們是否應該歡慶電影帶來的歡樂和魔力？

sentences.english: The main hub for the festivities will be Trafalgar Square in the very centre of London.
sentences.chinese: 歡慶活動的中心將在倫敦市中心的特拉法加廣場。

sentences.english: Chinese workers set up a tent for the post-ceremony festivities.
sentences.chinese: 中國工人爲儀式之後的歡慶活動搭建帳篷。

sentences.english: In the sound of gongs and drums for celebrating rich harvest, you radiate extraordinary splendour of youth.
sentences.chinese: 在歡慶豐收的鑼鼓聲中，你綻放青春的異彩。

sentences.english: The event kicks off with performances by a live accordion band .
sentences.chinese: 歡慶活動由一個手風琴樂團的現場演奏揭開序幕。

sentences.english: Back-to-Front Day has been celebrated today throughout the country.
sentences.chinese: 今天舉國上下歡慶顛倒日。

sentences.english: But the Pilgrims' three-day feast is often called the nation's first Thanksgiving.
sentences.chinese: 但新移民爲期三日的歡慶通常被稱爲全美首個感恩節。

definition: to depart as quick as a flash/flash mob
to get together all at once
to fulfill one's dream/(divination) to predict the future by interpreting a dream/oneiromancy
